akfa_med_subtitle: AKFA Medline is the largest private multidisciplinary medical center in Central Asia with modern equipment.
star_med_subtitle: The Star Med diagnostic center is a multidisciplinary clinic for people who value comfort, a high level of service, and most importantly, want to be healthy.
al_hayat_subtitle: The modern multidisciplinary clinic 'HAYAT' was founded in 2015. It now has 3 branches and provides diagnostic, outpatient, and inpatient care in many areas of medicine for adults and children.
era_med_subtitle: The multidisciplinary Uzbek-Austrian clinic EraMed was founded in 2018.
viva_med_subtitle: The Viva Med medical center is a modern medical center in Tashkent with a wide range of medical services based on modern standards of treatment and preventive care, using advanced technologies and the clinical experience of highly qualified specialists.
asia_med_subtitle: Multidisciplinary inpatient clinic. Specialists of all profiles. Comprehensive diagnosis and treatment.
medion_activity: The Medion clinic network consists of three large multidisciplinary medical centers, each with its own unique feature. All clinics are equipped with modern equipment from foreign manufacturers such as GE HealthCare, Alma, Dornier, Olympus, and others.
about_medion: Medion is a leading network of private clinics in Tashkent that has earned the trust of patients through high-quality medical care. We offer accurate diagnostics on modern equipment from leading world manufacturers, as well as outpatient and inpatient treatment. Our local and foreign specialists successfully perform complex operations and provide full rehabilitation. Medion clinics employ highly qualified doctors. In our work, we use innovative technologies, proprietary methods, and modern scientific achievements to ensure the best treatment outcomes. Our clinic network offers medical care that meets world standards, with a high level of service for every patient. There is no need to travel abroad. With the Medion clinic network, you can receive a high level of clinical service in Uzbekistan.
history_medion: At the Scandinavia clinic, we strive to be your assistant on the path to a long, healthy, and high-quality life. Using the latest technologies in medicine and considering all the nuances of each patient's life, we offer solutions with proven effectiveness that allow you to maintain and improve your health. We respect you, which means we value every minute of your time. Therefore, every department of 'Scandinavia' has all the necessary conditions for you to receive quality medical care when it is convenient for you. We respect you, which means we value every minute of your time. Therefore, every department of 'Scandinavia' has all the necessary conditions for you to receive quality medical care when it is convenient for you.
if_you_experience: If you are experiencing the described symptoms, causing you to miss work or school, or limiting your daily activities, you should visit an allergist or pulmonologist to check if you have asthma. The same applies to checking for asthma in children. Everyone has their own asthma triggers, such as exercise, windy and/or very cold weather, severe nervous strain, contact with dust or animals, shouting, and crying. If you have asthma, you can minimize your symptoms by avoiding the factors that cause discomfort. Working together with an allergist or pulmonologist will help you understand your problem and feel well.
stoma: Stoma: care, ostomy bags and their use, diet, helpful tips
david_back: David Back Concept exercise machine complex
magnetic_desc: Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) is a modern method for examining human tissues and internal organs. The diagnosis is based on the effect of a powerful magnetic field and radiofrequency waves on the studied area of the body. As a result of the MRI, we get high-precision images in any plane, similar to anatomical sections, which allow for the most accurate diagnosis and determination of the specific treatment.
the_brand_of_the_year: Brand of the Year 2021 in the field of medicine
brand_of_the_year_desc: Best Brand of the Year 2021 in the field of medicine according to the jury of the Marketing Association of Uzbekistan.
the_medion_academy_train: The Medion Academy training center was created to organize training courses and workshops, as well as to hold business events.
our_mission: Our mission is to help doctors acquire additional skills for the successful treatment of patients.
values_desc:
Striving for knowledge
Responsibility for the information we provide
Education for benefit, not just for show
Commitment to the principles of evidence-based medicine
goals_desc: Conditions for the professional growth of doctors. Making necessary information more accessible. We want every doctor not only to gain knowledge but also to be able to confidently apply everything learned from us in daily practice. An educational base. We want to produce truly successful doctors - educated and competent. A system of requirements for a doctor's qualifications and opportunities for its assessment. We know what every doctor needs for an objective assessment of their level: understanding modern technologies, the ability to share patient values, and make decisions jointly with them. To combine the experience of the best doctors to create new training programs. To provide opportunities for development and experience exchange for partners. To systematize experience and knowledge for accessibility and benefit.
our_auditory:
Doctors of various specialties
Mid-level medical staff - male and female nurses
Young and inquisitive, experienced and responsible specialists in the medical field who are passionate about their work.
why_us_desc:
We conduct in-person classes with hands-on practice on truly advanced equipment.
Our webinars can be watched from anywhere: this is important not only for those on business trips but also for those living in other cities and countries.
The entire curriculum is designed with the latest scientific achievements in mind, and all instructors are practicing doctors with at least 10 years of experience.
Our courses are approved by the CME (Continuing Medical Education) committee - you will be able to earn points upon completion of the course.
